comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: Gustav Renker (born October 12, 1889 in Vienna , died July 23, 1967 in Langnau im Emmental, Canton Bern, Switzerland ) was a German-speaking journalist and writer who was known for his novels about mountains an homeland. de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gustav_Renker (german entry) see also data.onb.ac.at/nlv_lex/perslex/R/Renker_Gustav.htm (in german)
